title: Looking for a support player to duo with me in Ranked
body:
Hello Viewers.

IGN: FIRSTBL00D
Rank: Bronze 4 

I'm currently looking for a support to play with me in ranked games i main ADC have been playing for 5 years on and off.
I'm 19 years old and like to have fun and chat while in game so that's a +1 :D.

ADC's that i play good with. 
Jinx
Miss Fortune
Graves
Lucian
Ezreal

please add me in game if interested.

Thank you.
Kind Regards.

replies.body:
Hey man I'm a gold 2 support main with this account in b2 been meaning to rank it up for some time if you're interested add me 
IGN : FourInchesOfFury
Residence : Adelaide
Age : 19
Add me please, I'm starting to main support and looking for a duo,  I'm 15 and i'm bronze 2. Any other questions just message me or add me.
I love how much useless info is in this, yet not the actual main bit of useful info which is your rank.
